parameters.content:
# Step 2: AI-Powered News Article Scraper ü§ñ

This is the core node which uses ScrapeGraphAI to intelligently extract news articles from any website.

## How to Use
- Configure the target news website URL
- Use natural language to describe what data to extract
- The AI will automatically parse and structure the results

## Configuration
- **Website URL**: Target news website (e.g., BBC, CNN, Reuters)
- **User Prompt**: Natural language instructions for data extraction
- **API Credentials**: ScrapeGraphAI API key required

## Example
- **Website**: BBC News homepage
- **Instruction**: "Extract all article titles, URLs, and categories"

‚ö†Ô∏è **Note**: This is a community node requiring self-hosting

# Step 3: News Data Formatting and Processing üß±

This node transforms and structures the scraped news data for optimal Google Sheets compatibility.

## What it does
- Extracts articles array from ScrapeGraphAI response
- Maps each article to standardized format
- Ensures data consistency and structure
- Prepares clean data for spreadsheet storage

## Data Structure
- **title**: Article headline and title
- **url**: Direct link to the article
- **category**: Article category or section

## Customization
- Modify the JavaScript code to extract additional fields
- Add data validation and cleaning logic
- Implement error handling for malformed data

# Step 1: Automated News Collection Trigger ‚è±Ô∏è

This trigger automatically invokes the workflow at specified intervals to collect fresh news content.

## Configuration Options
- **Frequency**: Daily, hourly, or custom intervals
- **Time Zone**: Configure for your business hours
- **Execution Time**: Choose optimal times for news collection

## Best Practices
- Set appropriate intervals to respect rate limits
- Consider news website update frequencies
- Monitor execution logs for any issues
- Adjust frequency based on your monitoring needs

# Step 4: Google Sheets News Storage üìä

This node securely stores the processed news article data in your Google Sheets for analysis and tracking.

## What it does
- Connects to your Google Sheets account via OAuth2
- Appends new article data as rows
- Maintains historical data for trend analysis
- Provides structured data for business intelligence

## Configuration
- **Spreadsheet**: Select or create target Google Sheets document
- **Sheet Name**: Configure worksheet (default: Sheet1)
- **Operation**: Append mode for continuous data collection
- **Column Mapping**: Automatic mapping of title, url, category fields

## Data Management
- Each execution adds new article entries
- Historical data preserved for analysis
- Easy export and sharing capabilities
- Built-in Google Sheets analytics and filtering
